text: Madison Nicole "Maddie" Ziegler (; born September 30, 2002) is an American dancer, actress and author. She is known for appearing on the Lifetime's reality show Dance Moms from 2011 until 2016. She is also known for being in many music videos by Sia, beginning with "Chandelier" and "Elastic Heart". She also acted in Sia's film Music. Ziegler was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. ==References== Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:American dancers Category:Actors from Pittsburgh Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American child actors Category:Writers from Pittsburgh Category:Models from Pennsylvania Category:American choreographers Category:Participants in American reality television series Category:Singers from Pennsylvania
title: Maddie Ziegler
